data.title: Upcoming Cast Recordings
data.meta_description: The show tunes you need from the shows you love!
data.text:
Becoming Nancy (U.K. Cast Recording EP)

• Digital release: July 30, 2024

• Buy: Amazon, iTunes, Apple Music

• Writers: music by George Stiles, lyrics by Anthony Drewe

• Performers: Joseph Peacock, Daisy Greenwood, Genevieve Nicole, Paige Peddie, Rebecca Trehearn, and Joseph Vella

The Great Gatsby (Broadway)

• CD release: August 2, 2024

• Digital release: June 28, 2024

• Buy: Amazon, iTunes, Apple Music

• Label: Sony Masterworks Broadway

• Writers: music by Jason Howland, lyrics by Nathan Tysen

• Performers: Jeremy Jordan, Eva Noblezada, Noah J. Ricketts, Samantha Pauly, Sara Chase, John Zdrojeski, Paul Whitty, and Eric Anderson
